pinterest_metadata.title: Mirabel PDF Sewing Pattern - Instant Download | Sinclair Patterns
pinterest_metadata.description: Create your dream top and dress with this easy-to-follow PDF sewing pattern! Perfect for all skill levels. ✨ INCLUDES: ✓ Step-by-step instructions with illustrations ✓ Multiple size options ✓ Seam allowances included ✓ Print-at-home A4/US Letter format ✓ Projector file for A0 printing ✓ Layered pattern pieces for easy cutting. Start sewing today! 🧵✂️ #sewingpattern #pdfsewing #sinclairpatterns #handmadewardrobe #sewyourownclothes #diyfashion
